OOC:  You have all the fun parts of battle while I'm asleep, no fair...


BIC:
�Apewing�    �Speed Viper�     �Electronet�


   The 3 Fuzors heard what Shockwave said.

   "Okay, Aim at his left kneecap."  Apewing said as he fired two missles at 
the left kneecap.

   Speed Viper aimed his Rocket Launcher at Radicons left kneecap and fired 
two missles.

   Electronet fired 4 Electric blast at Radicons left kneecap and fired 4 
Optics at Radions left kneecap.

(Now thats going to be a sore left kneecap...)




>From: KSLawdogg@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Shockwave & Unitron
>Date: Sun, 15 Jul 2001 04:41:53 EDT
>
>Shockwave/Unitron:
>
>
>
>"It's that Hot Rod aft!  May I kill him?"
>
>"No.  Focus on that gestalt."
>
>"But it looks like they stopped opening fire."
>
>"No matter.  We can retreat quickly if need b--" Shockwave was interrupted 
>in
>his conversation via comm. with Unitron by Dreadwind.
>
>"I am Shockwave of the Neo Decepticon Empire!" he intoned loudly as he sped
>off through the air, still in his space fighter mode.  He launched two
>missiles down at Radistor's (sp? been awhile since I've seen that dude) 
>back.
>
>Unitron gave a disembodied sigh, launching off two missiles at Radistor's
>chest, ready to do evasive maneuvers when he was shot at with return fire.
>
>"Fuzor beings," Shockwave began an order via comm. with the three new 
>fuzors
>(Hedge), "concentrate your heaviest weaponsfire on the gestalt.  Damaging 
>him
>enough to break him apart will give us a strategic advantage."
